A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: this movie is like a boring fever dream. All dialoge was very awkward and the plot was all over the place. Introduced characters dont add anything and the character you love are butchered. Could only be considered good because of its huge budget. Lazy writing\, bad characterization\, laughable CGI\, and the movie was so goddamn dark the intire time\, walking out of the theatre was like walking out of mine you've been trapped in for five years. Couldn't have been worse if they tried. Definitly worse then the prequels. Save some money and watch it online.
